title: Butterfingers
text: Drop your weapon

title: Catch your breath
text: You can only take a move action next round

title: Stuck
text: Your weapon is stuck in a nearby surface. DC 20 Str check to free it

title: Backswing
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

title: Slipped
text: You are knocked prone

title: This sword is too heavy
text: You are fatigued

title: Awkward Attack
text: You take -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds

title: Overextend
text: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all adjacent opponents

title: Pulled Muscle
text: You take 1d4 points of Str damage

title: Fling
text: You drop your weapon and it lands 1d6 squares away in a random direction

title: Broken Blade
text: Your weapon is destroyed (Ref Negates) Magic weapons use their own save bonus (DMG 214)

title: Notched
text: Your weapon takes 1d6 points of damage, ignoring hardness

title: Parry! Dodge! Spin! Thrust!
text: You are dazed for 1 round

title: Hand it over
text: Your target gains possession of your weapon (Ref Negates)

title: Shield Crash
text: Your attack deals damage to your shield

title: Winded
text: You are exhausted (Fort negates)

title: Wide Open
text: You are flat-footed for 1 round

title: Critical Mistake
text: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

title: Strain
text: You take 1d4 points of Dex damage

title: Too Much Stuff
text: You become entangled in your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself

title: Spinning Swing
text: You are sickened for 1d4 rounds

title: I told you it was sharp
text: You take 1d6 points of bleed

title: Pin Prick
text: You take 1 point of bleed

title: Off Balance
text: You take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls for 1 round

title: Sorry
text: Your attack hits an ally adjacent to you or the target

title: Bonk
text: You are stunned for 1 round (Fort Negates)

title: Catastrophic Failure
text: You fall unconscious for 1d6 rounds (Will negates)

title: Pointy End Goes There
text: You take 1 point of Con damage

title: Broken Haft
text: Your weapon loses reach. You have a -4 penalty on attack rolls with it until repaired (DC 20 Craft check)

title: Fog of War
text: You threaten no square for 1d6 rounds

title: Go For The Eyes
text: You are blinded for 1 round

title: Punt
text: Your weapon flies 2d6 squares in a random direction

title: Bad Grip
text: Your weapon deals nonlethal damage for the next 3 rounds

title: Who Was That
text: You are dazed for 1d3 rounds

title: You Meant to do That
text: Move 10 feet in a random direction and provoke attacks of opportunity as normal

title: Eat Dirt
text: You fall prone and are blinded for 1d3 rounds (Fort Negates)

title: Second Thoughts
text: You are sickened for 1d6 rounds

title: Attack the Darkness
text: All your enemies have concealment from you for 1d4 rounds

title: Wait! What?
text: You are confused for 1 round

title: Wrong End
text: If you're using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 points of damage and 1 point of bleed

title: Vibration
text: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you take 1d3 of Str damage and drop your weapon

title: No Way
text: Your attack hits the target, but deals minimum damage

title: Funny Bone
text: You drop whatever is in your off hand

title: Bent
text: You take -4 penalty on all attacks with this weapon until it is repaired (DC 20 Craft Check)

title: All or Nothing
text: You take a -1 penalty on attack rolls until you score a critical hit

title: Surrounded by Foes
text: Your attack hits an ally within reach and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit

title: On the Receiving End
text: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target

title: Bohemian Earspoon
text: You are deafened until healed (DC 15 Heal Check)

title: Better to Give
text: You attack damages you instead. Use your target's Str modifier

title: Cutter
text: You take 1 point of Str bleed

title: This is Bad
text: You take an amount of bleed equal to your Str bonus (minimum 1)

title: Armor Smash
text: Your attack deals damage to your armor
